data.text: Winjauru un joma odak e dho nembe,
Ne omiyo lewa obedo ka ligangla mabith,
Ne owachona niya,
To ne awacho ni, “Asetiyo matek kayiem nono;
To koro Jehova Nyasaye wacho kama;
Owacho ni:
Ma e gima Jehova Nyasaye,
Ma e gima Jehova Nyasaye wacho,
kendo iwachne joma ni e twech ni, ‘Wuoguru oko,’
Kech ok nokagi kata riyo ok nologi,
Abiro loko godena duto yore
To ne, ginibi ka gia mabor;
Go koko nikech mor, yaye polo, bed gi ilo,
To Sayun nowacho niya,
“To bende dhako wiye diwil gi nyathi modhodho
Ne, asendiko nyingi ei lweta
Yawuoti noreti kaduogo iri
Tingʼ wangʼi malo kendo ingʼi koni gi koni:
“Kata obedo ni osetieki midongʼ
Nyithindo mane inywolo ka in e chandruok
Eka inipenjri e chunyi ni,
Ma e gima Jehova Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto wacho:
Ruodhi ema nobed kaka wuoneu kendo mond ruodhi
Bende dima jolweny maroteke gik ma giseyako,
To ma e gima Jehova Nyasaye wachoni:
Abiro miyo joma sandou nocham ringregi giwegi
